segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen and feeling a sense of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just running, endlessly pouring water onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's absolutely disgusting to see that much water just wasted and making a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is sheeting over the cabinet doors, ruining them for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This woman is standing right there, completely oblivious to the rising tide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so unaware of such a huge, obvious problem?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of running water must be quite loud, yet she hears nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine the cost of the water bill and the repairs needed for the damaged cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence is truly frustrating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet immediately before more damage is done.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an unnecessary waste, and it makes the entire scene feel so chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the dampness spreading across the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of permanent water damage is quite upsetting.
segments.speaker: PAR
